title: Teaching Assistant
text:
Computing (August 2023 - Present)
DCC(Data Centric Comput) (January 2023 - May 2023)
Computer Networks (August 2022 - December 2022)

title: Pinki Kumari
text:
Hi, I’m Pinki Kumari, pursuing M.Tech. In Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Gandhinagar.
I am working under the supervision of Prof. Anirban Dasgupta on “Hashing Algorithms for efficient training of Large Language Models and applying Locality Sensitive Hashing on Neural Tangent Kernels (LSH on NTK)”.
I did a 2-month Summer Internship at ThirdAI Corp., which trains Large Language Models on a single CPU instead of GPUs.
